actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2575 of title 10, United States Code, to provide for more efficient disposal of lost, abandoned or unclaimed personal property that comes into the custody or control of military departments.

summary.text: Regulates disposal of lost, abandoned, or unclaimed personal property that comes into the custody or control of United States military departments. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 2575(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2575 of title 10, United States Code, to provide for more efficient disposal of lost, abandoned or unclaimed personal property that comes into the custody or control of military departments.
